name: Crystaleers: Topaz's Tale
description:
How To Play:

W, A, S, D to move around.

E to pick up / put down things

Q To drop chromium.

Use your mouse to hover over things and get a better idea of what they do.

How Topaz Works:

Yellow, is caused by color centers. (Variations in a crystal's structure.) These color centers can be caused by radiation, and they can be removed by heat.

Blue is also caused by different color centers. Like yellow, these can be also be caused by radiation and removed by heat. Yellow color centers melt faster than blue ones.

Pink is caused by the amount of chromium in a topaz. In this game, chromium can be absorbed by picking it up from the ground.

Green, Purple, and Orange are caused by mixing the 3 primary colors like you would paint.

Mixing all three at once causes Brown Topaz.
